segments.text: Look at these newlyweds . They seem as if they are on top of the world .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , they do . It's great for them to tie the knot and get married .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: People who have just got married feel that the world is right before them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nothing seems to be happier for them .
segments.speaker: S2
